messages.title: TODAY IS ELECTION DAY
messages.content: Today’s the day you can help to BRING BACK SIMON. Your neighbours are voting right now. Don’t miss your chance to make your voice heard.

messages.title: IT’S GOING TO BE CLOSE!
messages.content: The race for who will represent YOU in Parliament is going to be extremely close. This race was decided by a handful of votes last time.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The race for who will represent YOU in Parliament is going to be extremely close. This race was decided by a handful of votes last time.

images.caption: Simon Hughes with a group of people holding Liberal Democrats banners.
